description.description: Description of what this role includes

excluded_features.description: List of feature IDs that members with this role should NOT have access to

is_default.description: Whether this is the default role for new members

is_admin.description: Whether this role has administrator privileges

show_tours.description: Whether users with this role should see page tours

default_landing_page.description: The page users with this role land on after login

layout_theme.description: Visual theme/layout to apply for users with this role

requires_effective_from_date.description: Whether assigning this role requires an Effective From date (e.g., for Alumni)
